channel.title: Function on TIBCO Cloud Integration - Flogo
channel.description: Recent content in Function on TIBCO Cloud Integration - Flogo

item.title: Import Template
item.description: Import Template We already have an working simple template which can guide you how to develop extensions Download Function Template Copy the template.zip into your GOPATH dir that created at Here Unzip the folder Now you will see we have an sample function placed under your folder. the category of the connector is math All function related code under ${GOPATH}/src/github.com/tibco/function/math/ Now we need setting up runtime code Creating folder structure under your GOPATH directory, ${GOPATH}/src/github.

item.title: Edit Template
item.description: Function Now let’s go to function folder ${GOPATH}/src/github.com/tibco/function/math/ description.json -> Description file which describe all function and it’s arguments math.go -> Runtime code go.mod -> Go runtime depedences file, the mod name must suffix with function category name Edit descriptor.json for only UI. we need make sure that all argument list in descriptor must match the argument define in runtime. Adding more functions under math category.
